text: Daniel Lurie (born February 4, 1977) is an American businessman, philanthropist and politician. Lurie has been the 46th Mayor of San Francisco since 2025. He is the founder and former CEO of Tipping Point Community. He is a member of the Democratic Party. In November 2024, Lurie was elected mayor after beating Mayor London Breed in the 2024 election. ==References== ==Other websites== *Campaign website Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Philanthropists from California Category:Businesspeople from San Francisco Category:Mayors of San Francisco Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Daniel Lurie
